com.facebook.stats.EventCounterIf

    Package Description
    com.facebook.stats

    • Uses of EventCounterIf in com.facebook.stats

      Classes in com.facebook.stats with type parameters of type EventCounterIf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractCompositeCounter<C extends EventCounterIf<C>>
      Tracks stats over a rolling time period (time window) of maxLength broken into parts (eventCounters list) of size maxChunkLength.
      class  AbstractCompositeSum<C extends EventCounterIf<C>> 
      interface  CompositeEventCounterIf<C extends EventCounterIf<C>> 
      interface  EventCounterIf<C extends EventCounterIf<C>>
      counter object representing some value over a timespan [start, end) mutable via the add() metthod
      Subinterfaces of EventCounterIf in com.facebook.stats 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  CompositeEventCounterIf<C extends EventCounterIf<C>> 
      interface  EventCounter
      marker interface: this is required for for any class that requires a generic of the type C extends EventCounterIf
      interface  GaugeCounter
      Like an EventCounter but with additional functionality and additional overhead.
      Classes in com.facebook.stats that implement EventCounterIf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractCompositeCounter<C extends EventCounterIf<C>>
      Tracks stats over a rolling time period (time window) of maxLength broken into parts (eventCounters list) of size maxChunkLength.
      class  AbstractCompositeSum<C extends EventCounterIf<C>> 
      class  AssociativeAggregationCounter 
      class  CompositeGaugeCounter
      Keeps a list of gauge counters (see AbstractCompositeCounter) that look like one summarized gauge counter.
      class  CompositeMax 
      class  CompositeMin 
      class  CompositeSum
      stats class that is useful for tracking the number of events that occur in a given time window.
      class  DecayCounter
      special purpose counter that decays exponentially fashion.
      class  DefaultGaugeCounter
      Default implementation of GaugeCounter.
      class  EventCounterImpl
      reference implementation of a simple counter for a bounded period of time
      class  FastGaugeCounter
      Fast implementation of GaugeCounter that may give slightly inaccurate values in certain race conditions, but should produce close to accurate results in the long run.
      class  MaxEventCounter 
      class  MinEventCounter 
      class  SumEventCounter
      Deprecated. 
      see original simple implementation, EventCounterImpl which does the same thing, but avoids encapsulation violation
      Methods in com.facebook.stats with parameters of type EventCounterIf 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected float AbstractCompositeCounter.getExpiredFraction(EventCounterIf<C> oldestCounter)
      Takes the oldest counter and returns the fraction [0, 1] of it that has extended outside the current time window of the composite counter.
